languages.text: "Неужели так сложно ответить на столь простой вопрос? Я просил{mf||а} рассказать о себе, а не своем роде".

traits.locale_text: "Неужели так сложно ответить на столь простой вопрос? Я просил{mf||а} рассказать о тебе, а не твоем доме".

languages.text: "Is answering a simple question that difficult? I asked you to tell me about yourself, not your family."
languages.original_text: "Неужели так сложно ответить на столь простой вопрос? Я просил{mf||а} рассказать о себе, а не своем роде".

traits.locale_text: "Is answering a simple question that difficult? I asked you to tell me about yourself, not your family."
"Is answering a simple question that difficult? I asked you to tell me about yourself, not your family."
"Is answering a simple question that difficult? I asked you to tell me about yourself, not your family."
"Is answering a simple question that difficult? I asked you to tell me about yourself, not your family."
"Is answering a simple question that difficult? I asked you to tell me about yourself, not your family."

languages.text: “这么简单的问题有那么难回答吗？我让你介绍你自己的情况，不是让你介绍你的家族。”
languages.original_text: "Is answering a simple question that difficult? I asked you to tell me about yourself, not your family."

traits.locale_text: “这么简单的问题有那么难回答吗？我让你介绍你自己的情况，不是让你介绍你的家族。”

languages.text: «¿Tan difícil le resulta responder a una pregunta? Le he preguntado por usted, no por su familia».
languages.original_text: "Is answering a simple question that difficult? I asked you to tell me about yourself, not your family."

traits.locale_text: «¿Tan difícil le resulta responder a una pregunta? Le he preguntado por usted, no por su familia».

languages.text: 「簡単な質問に答えるのもそれほど難しいというのか？家族のことではなく、お前自身について話してくれと言ったんだ」
languages.original_text: "Is answering a simple question that difficult? I asked you to tell me about yourself, not your family."

traits.locale_text: 「簡単な質問に答えるのもそれほど難しいというのか？家族のことではなく、お前自身について話してくれと言ったんだ」

languages.text: "Ist es so schwierig, eine einfache Frage zu beantworten? Ich habe Euch gebeten, mir etwas über Euch selbst zu erzählen, nicht über Eure Familie."
languages.original_text: "Is answering a simple question that difficult? I asked you to tell me about yourself, not your family."

traits.locale_text: "Ist es so schwierig, eine einfache Frage zu beantworten? Ich habe Euch gebeten, mir etwas über Euch selbst zu erzählen, nicht über Eure Familie."

languages.text: « Ma question n'était pourtant pas compliquée. Je vous ai demandé de me parler de vous, pas de votre famille. »
languages.original_text: "Is answering a simple question that difficult? I asked you to tell me about yourself, not your family."

traits.locale_text: « Ma question n'était pourtant pas compliquée. Je vous ai demandé de me parler de vous, pas de votre famille. »

languages.text: "Basit bir soruya cevap vermek bu kadar mı zor? Ailenden değil, kendinden bahset dedim."
languages.original_text: "Is answering a simple question that difficult? I asked you to tell me about yourself, not your family."

traits.locale_text: "Basit bir soruya cevap vermek bu kadar mı zor? Bana kendinden bahset dedim, ailenden değil."
